verses.name: Isaiah 44:1
verses.text: Yet now hear, O Jacob my servant; and Israel, whom I have chosen:

verses.name: Isaiah 44:2
verses.text: Thus saith the Lord that made thee, and formed thee from the womb, which will help thee; Fear not, O Jacob, my servant; and thou, Jesurun, whom I have chosen.

verses.name: Isaiah 44:3
verses.text: For I will pour water upon him that is thirsty, and floods upon the dry ground: I will pour my spirit upon thy seed, and my blessing upon thine offspring:

verses.name: Isaiah 44:4
verses.text: And they shall spring up as among the grass, as willows by the water courses.
